text: "Right to Be Wrong" is a 2004 song by English musician Joss Stone and is the second single from her second studio album Mind Body & Soul. It went to number 29 in the United Kingdom, number 33 in Scotland, number 66 in Australia, number 46 in Switzerland and number 30 in Italy. ==Track listings== UK CD single # "Right to Be Wrong" – 4:39 # "The Player" – 4:42 # "Don't Know How" (live performance from AOL Sessions) – 5:27 UK 7-inch single and European CD single # "Right to Be Wrong" – 4:39 # "Jet Lag" (acoustic live performance from AOL Sessions) – 4:21 US promo CD # "Right to Be Wrong" (radio edit) – 3:59 ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Joss Stone songs
title: Right to Be Wrong
